name: Arrow Heads
description: Grab your friends, neighbors, extended family and that handsome cashier from the grocery store and get ready for some sweet, award-winning, couch and online multiplayer. With your trusty bow, shoot, dodge and deflect arrows in this zany isometric archery game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Dual core, 2 GHz or better Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card. Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Internet connection required for online features.  Gamepad recommended.
